channel.title: Market Risk on FinanClub

item.title: KDP
item.description: score:159 Chances: Keurig Dr Pepper is on a growth track, thanks to its brand strength, innovation efforts, resilient category trends, market share gains, and significant pricing actions. The company has a strong position in the non-alcoholic beverages market, with a wide range of popular brands and a focus on productivity gains and cost-saving endeavors.

item.title: PAA
item.description: score:14 Chances: Plains All American Pipeline, L.P. beats earnings expectations with reported EPS of $0.4451, compared to expectations of $0.37. Plains All American Pipeline, L.P. and Plains GP Holdings LP combined Earnings Call indicates positive outlook for future growth in crude production in the Permian basin.
